Title: zstack-cli
Description:
LogIn
In this ZStack version(0.9), the IAM(Identity and Access Management) system is not ready; only one account ‘admin’ with default password(‘password’) is available. Before executing any commands, you need to run the login command ‘LogInByAccount’ to get a session token which is automatically saved by zstack-cli to ~/.zstack/cli/session and you don’t need to keep it separately:
